All APIs

SQL Injection Scanner

Detects SQL injection vulnerabilities in code strings.

In Progress

SEO Meta Validator

Analyzes and suggests improvements for HTML meta tags.

In Progress

Code Complexity Analyzer

Calculates cyclomatic complexity for a function.

In Progress

Dependency Vulnerability Checker

Checks package.json/requirements.txt against known vulnerabilities.

In Progress

JSON-to-XML Converter

Converts JSON to XML and vice-versa.

In Progress

YAML Validator Formatter

Validates and beautifies YAML.

In Progress

CSV-to-JSON API

Converts CSV strings to JSON arrays.

In Progress

Image Format Converter

Converts image formats using free tier services.

In Progress

PDF Text Extractor

Extracts text from PDF files.

In Progress

Dockerfile Generator

Generates a Dockerfile based on language and framework.

In Progress

Nginx Config Generator

Creates a basic Nginx config for a web app.

In Progress

Let's Encrypt Bot Simulator

Simulates the certificate issuance process for troubleshooting.

In Progress

Git Command Helper

Explains complex git commands in simple terms.

In Progress

UUID Generator

Generates batches of UUIDs.

In Progress

Password Strength API

Checks password strength and breaches.

In Progress

Hash Generator

Hashes text with multiple algorithms (MD5, SHA256, etc.).

In Progress

Unit Test Generator

Generates basic unit test skeletons for simple functions.

In Progress

Color Converter API

Converts between HEX, RGB, HSL, etc.

In Progress

Fake User Generator

Generates fake user data for testing.
